SEARCH
Package Zoo

Class Enclosure

java.lang.Object
Zoo.Enclosure
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Aquarium, Aviary
public class Enclosure extends Object implements Runnable
Represents an Enclosure for managing and simulating various creatures.

      cleanness - The initial cleanliness state of the enclosure.

    • addCreature

      public boolean addCreature(Creature newCreature)
      Add a creature to the enclosure.
      Parameters:
      newCreature - The creature to be added.
      Returns:
      False if creature is null or addition failed. True if success.

    • checkCompatibility

      public boolean checkCompatibility(Creature creature)
      Checks if a creature can be added to the enclosure by first checking the current number of creatures in the enclosure and then checks if the species is compatible with the enclosure.
      Parameters:
      creature - the creature we might want to add to the enclosure
      Returns:
      True if the creature is compatible with the enclosure and can be added, False if not enclosure is full or creature is not of the same species.

    • removeCreature

      public Creature removeCreature(int creatureIndex)
      Remove a creature from the enclosure by searching the object.
      Parameters:
      creatureIndex - The index of the creature to be removed.
      Returns:
      The creature removed from the zoo. Returns null if there is no creature in the enclosure or the creature is null.

    • removeCreature

      public Creature removeCreature(Creature creature)
      Remove a creature from the enclosure.
      Parameters:
      creature - The creature to be removed.
      Returns:
      The creature removed from the zoo. Returns null if there is no creature in the enclosure or the creature is null.
